Discription: I specialize in Python, Django, Flask, React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build dynamic, user-friendly web applications. In addition to development, I also work on digital marketing strategies to help businesses grow their online presence. Whether you're looking for custom web development or comprehensive digital solutions, I deliver high-performance, scalable results tailored to your business needs. Explore my portfolio to see impactful projects and discover how I can help bring your ideas to life.
skillsHeading: Skills I'm learning, building, and growing every day.

skillsDescription.paragraph1: I work with Python, Django, Flask, React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build fast and reliable web applications. From backend logic to frontend components, I enjoy bringing ideas to life through code.
skillsDescription.paragraph2: Alongside development, I also apply digital marketing skills to help businesses improve their online reach through basic SEO, social media strategies, and content promotion.
